examples.example: 在悠闲的午后，和朋友们一起享用美味的下午茶，真是一件十分惬意的事情。

translate.english: In a leisurely afternoon, enjoying delicious afternoon tea with friends together is really a very pleasant thing.

examples.example: 周末我约了闺蜜一起去喝下午茶，享受美好的时光。

translate.english: On the weekend, I made an appointment with my best friend to go to have afternoon tea together and enjoy the wonderful time.

examples.example: 周末的时候，我喜欢约上家人一起去喝下午茶，共享温馨欢乐的时光。

translate.english: At the weekend, I like to invite my family to go for afternoon tea together and share the warm and joyful time.
